abstract: NHL Roundup; Tampa Bay Lightning defeat New Jersey Devils, 4-0; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Steven Stamkos extended his goal-scoring streak to a season-high five games, and the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the host Devils, 4-0, on Friday night for their fifth straight victory.

headline.main: Devils Stifled by Lightning; Capitals Rally to Edge Wild
headline.print_headline: Devils Stifled by Lightning; Capitals Rally to Edge Wild

snippet: Steven Stamkos extended his goal-scoring streak to a season-high five games, and the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the host Devils, 4-0, on Friday night for their fifth straight victory.
